original: Game Master
translation: 游戏大师

original: This character is renowned as an avid and masterful game player - anything from chess to tabula, to exotic pachisi.
translation: 这个角色是出了名的游戏大师，不论是象棋还是双陆棋，甚至是异国的十字戏都不在话下。

original: Is NOT Married to §Y$WHO$§!
translation: 没有与§Y$WHO$§!结婚

original: Is Married to §Y$WHO$§!
translation: 与§Y$WHO$§!结婚

original: the Shrewd
translation: 机灵者

original: the Wily
translation: 智者

original: the Fox
translation: 狐狸

original: the Jovial
translation: 友善者

original: the Jolly
translation: 风趣者

original: the Gracious
translation: 亲切者

original: Trade Route
translation: 贸易商路

original: This county has a thriving trade with a foreign realm bringing in exotic goods.
translation: 这个省份与国外繁荣的交易带来了异域商品。

original: Stone Quarry
translation: 采石场

original: A stone quarry in this county produces a surplus of cheap building materials.
translation: 这个省份的采石场生产大量廉价的建筑材料。

original: Leaning Tower
translation: 斜塔

original: A leaning tower dominates the landscape shamefully for the founder.
translation: 一座斜塔耸立起，笑说建筑师不入行。

original: Leaning Tower
translation: 斜塔

original: A leaning tower dominates the landscape. This spectacular sight attracts people from afar.
translation: 一座斜塔耸立起，引得远近人来观。

original: Aspiring Trader
translation: 有志商人

original: This character is starting to learn the art of making money and fame from money.
translation: 这个角色刚开始学习商道，有望一天名利两获。

original: Trader
translation: 商人

original: This character has learned how to attract money to his coffers in all kinds of ways.
translation: 这个角色通晓敛财之道。

original: Business Contacts
translation: 商业联络

original: This character has helped to create a thriving business climate in the realm.
translation: 这个角色帮助国度建立了良好的商业环境。

original: Pavilion
translation: 凉亭

original: This character has a romantic and secluded pavilion in [GetHerHis] garden.
translation: 在[GetHerHis]花园里，有个浪漫僻静的亭子。

original: Building Towards Heaven
translation: 攀天大厦

original: The clergy don't really like people building their own stairways to heaven.
translation: 教士们可不喜欢众人都有自己通往天国的阶梯。

original: Fountain
translation: 喷泉

original: This character has a large fountain in [GetHerHis] garden.
translation: 在[GetHerHis]花园里，有个大喷泉。

original: Fountain
translation: 喷泉

original: This character has a large fountain in [GetHerHis] garden filled with wine.
translation: 在[GetHerHis]花园里，有个喷酒的大喷泉。

original: Great Tower
translation: 高塔

original: This character is the founder of a great tower.
translation: 这个角色建了座高塔。

original: Trade Partner
translation: 贸易伙伴

original: Disrespecting Culture
translation: 不敬文化

original: Fine Gift
translation: 精巧的礼物

original: Religious Quarrel
translation: 宗教分歧

original: Family Statues
translation: 家庭塑像

original: Religious Agenda
translation: 宗教议程

original: Annoyed
translation: 不愉快

original: Amateur Steward
translation: 业余管家

original: This character is an aspiring steward who seeks to master the arts of administration and governance.
translation: 这个角色有志成为一个精通管理之道的人。

original: Steward
translation: 管理人

original: This character is an experienced steward, gifted in administration and rulership.
translation: 这个角色通晓管理之道。

original: Great Raja Dharma
translation: 大法王

original: This character has followed the tenets of Dharma and proven to be an exceptional ruler.
translation: 这个角色遵循诸法要旨，着实是个伟大的统治者。

original: the Rash
translation: 鲁莽者

original: Legendary Wisdom
translation: 传奇智者

original: The wisdom of this character is renowned throughout the lands.
translation: 这人的智慧无人不知无人不晓。

original: Respected Ruler
translation: 受敬重的统治者

original: This character has won respect as a ruler.
translation: 身为统治者，这个角色在国内外都受人敬仰。

original: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], the target of my seduction, is now my [GetFromFromFromRelation], making further efforts rather pointless.
translation: 我勾引的目标，[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]，现在是我的[GetFromFromFromRelation]，再追求下去也没什么好处了。

original: [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] is mine anyway
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]已经是我的人儿了。

original: I won't give up just yet
translation: 我还不会放弃

original: My agent in [target_captive.Host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s court, [target_agent.GetBestName], is no longer able to carry out the mission.
translation: 在 [target_captive.Host.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]的小小鸟告诉我，[target_agent.GetBestName]，已经无法继续任务了。

original: I will have to look for another contact...
translation: 看来我得找新线人了

original: Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], I fear that the plan I have devised to liberate [target_captive.GetBestName] will cost more money than I had estimated. If you still wish see [target_captive.GetObjectPronoun] free, please send me the necessary funds.\n\nYour friend, [target_agent.GetBestName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，恐怕我解救[target_captive.GetBestName]的计划需要花费更多金钱。如果你希望[target_captive.GetObjectPronoun]取得自由，请送来更多的资金。\n\n你的朋友，[target_agent.GetBestName]

original: I guess I have no choice...
translation: 看来我别无选择……

original: Time to abandon this plan
translation: 是时候放弃了

original: Despite my best efforts, I still have not managed to find anyone at the court of [target_captive.Host.GetTitledFirstName] who would be willing to help [target_captive.GetBestName] escape.
translation: 我尽力了，但仍没有在[target_captive.Host.GetTitledFirstName]的宫中找到愿意帮助[target_captive.GetBestName]逃脱的人。

original: Keep looking
translation: 继续找

original: I give up!
translation: 我放弃！

original: I shall be genial and well liked
translation: 我真诚又受欢迎

original: I shall master the game of life
translation: 我将成为人生路的大师

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has previously expressed a desire to find ways to bring more wealth to the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Now it seems there has arisen an opportunity to set up a new and possibly lucrative trade route.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]之前说他想让[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName][From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]发财。现在有个机会，没准能建立起一条能赚钱的新贸易路线。

original: Discuss it with [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 与[From.GetTitledFirstName]商讨。

original: I have more important matters to attend to.
translation: 我有更重要的事情要做。

original: Your [From.GetJobTitle] comes to see you one afternoon. [From.GetSheHeCap] explains that [From.GetSheHe] has devised a plan to bring in exotic goods by setting up a trade route with a foreign realm. This would of course require a sizeable monetary investment but the potential profits would also be great.
translation: 某天下午，你的[From.GetJobTitle]前来觐见。[From.GetSheHeCap]说自己有一个从异国引进物资的计划，[From.GetSheHe]建议同外国建立商路，这无疑需要进行一次代价昂贵的远行，不过潜在的利润同样丰厚。

original: Let's organize an expedition.
translation: 启程远行。

original: My money has better uses.
translation: 算了，钱还是得花在刀尖上。

original: The time has come to purchase pack animals for our planned merchant expedition. Strong and sturdy beasts are available at the market but they come at quite a hefty price.
translation: 是时候组织商队，带上驮畜启程远行了。你前去寻找适合远行的强壮动物，但价格不菲。

original: Purchase them. We'll need the best ones available.
translation: 买下来，要最好的。

original: Hire a crew of bandits to steal the animals.
translation: 雇一伙强盗去偷驮畜。

original: On second thought, I really can't afford this.
translation: 想了想，我真的没钱。

original: The time has come to outfit a ship for our trading expedition. The harbormaster shows you a large ship with a sizeable cargo hold that would be perfect for this job, but it does come at quite a hefty price.
translation: 是时候准备远航的船只了。港口管理员指了一条仓库够大适合这次远航的船，但价格不菲。

original: Buy the merchant ship for the journey.
translation: 从商人手里买下这条船。

original: Hire a crew of bandits to steal the ship.
translation: 雇一伙强盗去偷这条船。

original: On second thought, I really can't afford this.
translation: 想了想，我真的没钱。

original: The word has spread that you're planning a trading expedition, and a group of [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s have arrived at your court with a request. They are offering temple funds for the journey if you will allow them to come along on the journey.
translation: 你远行的计划传开了，一些[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]来到你面前，提出教会能支付一部分开销，只要你能带上它们去异国。

original: Of course, it will be an honor to have you with us.
translation: 当然，与你们同行是我的荣幸。

original: No, I can't risk them getting in the way.
translation: 不行，要是你们碍事怎么办。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s have been giving the crew nervous glares for a couple of days now and today confronted you voicing concerns about traveling with thieves and bandits. They say that [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful should not consort with such people.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]盯着船员让他们感到不快。今天他们告知你，同贼匪旅行让他们感到担忧。他接着指出同这种人一同旅行不被[Root.Religion.GetName]认可。

original: Oh well.
translation: 好吧。

original: We're helping these men to a life without crime.
translation: 我们是在提供他们不犯罪也能生存下去的途径。

original: A message arrives informing you that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is planning to open a foreign trade route. As this route is intended to travel through your areas of interest you are surely entitled to some compensation.
translation: 消息传来说 [From.GetTitledFirstName]正计划去异国建立商路。鉴于商路经过你利益所在的地区，自然你可以要求一笔钱补偿可能的贸易损失。

original: Demand monetary compensation.
translation: 要求金钱补偿。

original: Never mind.
translation: 算了。

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have been informed of your ambitions to establish new trade operations near my lands. I do hope that you intend to compensate me for this incursion into the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Signed, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我听说你有意经过我国建立商路。我希望商路造成[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的贸易损失能够得到补偿。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Here are some coins for the [From.GetTitle].
translation: 这些钱是给[From.GetTitle]的。

original: This is none of your business.
translation: 这与你无关。

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Of course you shall be compensated for our infringement.

Signed, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我们应当因为我们的侵犯而对你进行补偿。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I understand your concerns but my undertakings are none of your business.

Signed, 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我了解你的关切，但这是我的事业，而不是你的。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Great!
translation: 太棒了！

original: That pirate!
translation: 那个海盗！

original: The bandits you hired failed with their retrieval of the pack animals. Even worse, some of them were arrested and subsequently revealed your involvement. It seems like this expedition has to be abandoned for now.
translation: 你雇佣去偷取牲畜的土匪已经失败，更糟糕的是，他们中的一些人被捕，并透露了幕后指使。貌似你现在不得不放弃这次远征。

original: The bandits you hired failed with their retrieval of the ship. Even worse, some of them were arrested and subsequently revealed your involvement. It seems like this expedition has to be abandoned for now.
translation: 你雇佣去偷取船只的土匪已经失败，更糟糕的是，他们中的一些人被捕，并透露了幕后指使。貌似你现在不得不放弃这次远征。

original: That's terrible!
translation: 太糟糕了！

original: It is time to set out on the trading expedition. Hopefully it will yield good profits.
translation: 现在是时候出发进行商业远行了，希望收成不错。

original: To foreign lands!
translation: 让我们前往外国的土地！

original: Your expedition has finally reached the realm of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Your Steward asks you what gift we shall bring forth as a token of friendship to [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 探险队终于到达[From.GetTitledFirstName]的领地。你的管家问你要送什么礼物，作为与[From.GetTitledFirstName]友谊的象征。

original: A dozen strong horses.
translation: 十几匹强壮的马。

original: A mighty elephant.
translation: 一头强壮的大象。

original: A dozen tough warriors.
translation: 十几个强悍的战士。

original: A dozen sturdy camels.
translation: 十几匹强壮的骆驼。

original: A chest with quality cloth from back home.
translation: 家里放好衣服的箱子

original: A pouch of rare herbs.
translation: 一小袋儿珍贵的草药。

original: My courtesy should be enough of a gift.
translation: 我的使节应该带上足够的礼物。

original: At dinner, you notice [From.GetBestName]'s face growing red with annoyance as he glares at your Steward shovelling his food in with his bare hands.
translation: 你注意到[From.GetBestName]的脸越来越红，因为他瞪着你的总管正在徒手扒拉着吃饭。

original: Please excuse [steward.GetHerHim], I am still trying to teach this barbarian proper manners.
translation: 请原谅[steward.GetHerHim]，我还在试图给这个野蛮人教导礼仪。

original: I'm hungry too!
translation: 我也饿了！

original: As you spend more time talking to [From.GetBestName], you realize that you have a lot more in common than mere business interests.
translation: 花越多的时间与[From.GetBestName]讨论，你越知道你们俩有着超越商业利益的共同之处。

original: After long hours negotiating and discussing possible terms of trade, you and [From.GetBestName] seem to have arrived at a mutual understanding.
translation: 经过对贸易问题长时间的谈判和讨论，你和[From.GetBestName]似乎达成了共同意见。

original: The increasingly difficult negotiations between you and [From.GetBestName] are suddenly interrupted when [From.GetBestName] slams [From.GetHerHis] fist on the table. It seems like [From.GetSheHe] can no longer bear your presence in the room and when you decide to leave he shouts '[GetFromRootInsult]' after you.
translation: 那场在你和[From.GetBestName]之间展开的愈发艰难的谈判被突然打断了，猛然间[From.GetBestName]将[From.GetHerHis]拳头砸在了桌子上。看来[From.GetSheHe]无法忍受你出现在屋子内，当你决定离开时他在你背后大声吼道「[GetFromRootInsult]」。

original: I've gained both a friend and a profitable agreement.
translation: 我不仅结交了朋友，还达成了一份有利可图的协议。

original: This will be a profitable agreement.
translation: 这将是一份有利可图的协议。

original: I guess that was it then.
translation: 我猜到此为止了。

original: With the new trade route set up you return with the first batch of goods and sell them off for a nice profit. The influx of new wares will also benefit the economy for a long period to come.
translation: 随着新的贸易路线建立，你带回了首批商品，买卖获得了不错的利润。新商品的进入也将有利于未来经济的长期发展。

original: More money is always needed.
translation: 钱永远不嫌多。

original: The trade expedition was a failure as you didn't manage to close a deal for foreign goods. This is seen as a failure not only by you but also by everyone in your vicinity.
translation: 你的这次贸易远征被视为一次重大的失败，你没能获得达到协议要求的商品。这不仅被你也被你身边的人视为失败。

original: At least I learned something.
translation: 至少我学到了一点东西。

original: You are walking idly around the court of [From.GetTitledFirstName] when you suddenly hear a discussion increasing in intensity around the corner. Turning the corner you're surprised to see one of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s from your expedition engaged in a wild theological debate with a local noble. This could endanger the whole venture!
translation: 你地悠闲地漫步在[From.GetTitledFirstName]，当你听到一个角落里激烈的讨论。转向角落你很惊讶地看到远征队的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]正在与当地的贵族进行激烈神学争论。这可能会危及这次远征的成败！

original: This must be stopped.
translation: 这个闹剧必须被停止。

original: I will intervene with my charm and soothe the debaters.
translation: 我会用我的魅力来调节矛盾。

original: These heretics need to see the error of their ways.
translation: 这些异端的错误行为必须被纠正！

original: These heathens need to see the error of their ways.
translation: 这些异端的错误行为必须被纠正！

original: Your [steward.GetJobTitle] has brought in riches to your realm through [steward.GetHerHis] competent handling of the trading expedition and [steward.GetSheHe] probably expects to be rewarded with a share of the wealth.
translation: 你的[steward.GetJobTitle]通过[steward.GetHerHis]处理贸易远征事务为你带来了财富，[steward.GetSheHe]可能期待一些物质奖励。

original: I will reward [steward.GetHerHim] appropriately.
translation: 我将给予[steward.GetHerHim]合适的奖励。

original: [steward.GetSheHeCap] was just doing [steward.GetHerHis] duty.
translation: [steward.GetSheHeCap]只不过做了[steward.GetHerHis]份内的事情而已。

original: While I was at the foreign court I also spent some time observing and discussing with the courtiers regarding how they organize their administration. It is fascinating how differently they manage things over here.
translation: 虽然我身在国外，但我也花了一些时间观察这里的廷臣并与他们讨论行政组织事务。有趣的是在这里他们的处事方法与众不同。

original: I should apply some of these tricks when managing my own finances.
translation: 这其中的一些技巧，可以使我更有效地管理我的财务。

original: The trade route from [Root.GetName] is in dire need of new pack animals and equipment to be able to continue bringing in goods to our realm.
translation: 从[Root.GetName]开始的贸易路线迫切的需要新的牲畜和装备来继续装载货物到我们的领地。

original: The trade route from [Root.GetName] is in dire need of a new ship and equipment to be able to continue bringing in goods to our realm.
translation: 从[Root.GetName]开始的贸易路线迫切的需要新的船只和装备来继续装载货物到我们的领地。

original: I need to keep this trade route running.
translation: 我需要保持这条贸易路线的运行。

original: It's too expensive.
translation: 这实在太过昂贵。

original: You've been spending countless hours sketching up plans for different building projects when you suddenly realize how you could display your extraordinary architectural skills. You will build a grand tower that will dwarf everything else in the landscape.
translation: 你已经花了无数个小时来设计草图，以便建设不同凡响的的项目，终于，你想出了可以真正展现你非凡建筑能力的方案，你会建造一座一览众山小的庞大塔楼。

original: This will be glorious.
translation: 这将是辉煌的成就！

original: But I won't be able to afford it.
translation: 但是我负担不起。

original: The tower construction will need a mason to work the stone for both beauty and strength. The question is whom you should hire for this delicate work.
translation: 我们需要一个石匠把石塔建得既美观又稳固。现在的问题是，谁可以担此重任呢？

original: I know a craftsman that has the skill.
translation: 我知道有一个可以担此重任的工匠。

original: Any boy off the street will do fine.
translation: 在街上随便找个男孩就行。

original: The doubters will be proven wrong.
translation: 我会证明这些怀疑者是错的。

original: [From.GetBestName] comes up to you and complains about what hard and tiresome work it is to plan out how to carve the stones for the tower. He therefore asks you for more payment to finish the plans since he has already used up the first payment. Strangely enough, according to rumor he seems to have had a lot of time to spare chasing after women in your court.
translation: [From.GetBestName]过来见你，告诉你按照计划雕刻石头塔是如何的艰苦与繁琐。因此他要求您提供更多资金完成您的计划，因为他已经用完了首付款。奇怪的是，据传言他似乎花大把时间追求你宫廷里的女人。

original: [From.GetBestName] has been working tirelessly on planning the carving of the stones for the tower. He now approaches you with dark circles under his eyes and petitions you for extra funds, claiming his father is sick and his family needs aid.
translation: [From.GetBestName]一直在不知疲倦地按照计划来雕刻石塔。他现在带着黑眼圈来向你恳求一些额外的资金，因为他无法照料他的家人，而他的父亲生病了。

original: Very well, but make sure to carry on with your work.
translation: 可以，但你一定要继续你的工作。

original: You're just using the money on your lustful adventures.
translation: 你只会用这些钱去风流。

original: Very well, but make sure to carry on with your work.
translation: 可以，但你一定要继续你的工作。

original: I already paid you, now get to it!
translation: 我给过你钱了，继续工作去！

original: Before the construction of a building this large can begin we need to make sure we have enough high-quality stone. Your Steward suggests importing the stone from a reliable trade partner while it could be beneficial to the region to have access to nearby quarry.
translation: 在开始建筑这个大工程之前，我们需要确保我们有足够的优质石材。你的财政总管建议找到一个可以长期提供优质石材的可靠的进货商，或者自建采石场对本地更有利。

original: Import the stone.
translation: 买进石材。

original: Build a quarry.
translation: 建一个采石场。

original: I could reuse some old building materials from the castle.
translation: 我们可以用一些城堡里的老材料。

original: During the construction of your grand tower in [This.Capital.GetName], a couple of the workers were killed by a falling granite block as the ropes holding it snapped. People are now demanding stricter security measures as well as compensation to the families that lost their husbands and fathers in this tragic incident.
translation: 您在[This.Capital.GetName]修筑的高塔发生了事故，栓花岗岩砖块的绳子突然断裂，几个工人被砸中，当场死亡。当地居民现在要求您进行更严格的安全培训并赔偿在悲剧中失去顶梁柱的家庭。

original: Peasants are expendable.
translation: 这些农民都是消耗品。

original: I will compensate the families for their loss.
translation: 我会补偿家属的损失。

original: After decades of providing the county with building materials, the stone quarry in [Root.GetName] has been shut down as it no longer produces quality stone.
translation: 在向全省提供了几十年建筑材料后，[Root.GetName]的采石场因为不再能产出高品质的石材，已经停工了。

original: That's too bad.
translation: 这太糟糕了。

original: [From.GetBestName] approaches you at court, clearly upset. [From.GetSheHeCap] has seen that the new tower now stretches higher than any temple in the realm. [From.GetSheHeCap] raises [From.GetHerHis] voice and nearly screams 'This is unacceptable! You cannot climb into Heaven no matter how much you try, the way to Heaven is the domain of the Church!'.
translation: [From.GetBestName]心情不悦地来找你。[From.GetSheHeCap]看到新塔楼不断拔高，高过了领地内所有的教堂。[From.GetSheHeCap]提高了[From.GetHerHis]嗓门，近乎尖叫地说：「我们不能接受！无论你怎么尝试也不能自行爬进天堂，天堂之路是属于教会的领域！」

original: Go back to your old scriptures.
translation: 滚回去读经吧。

original: I guess we can cut some height off the tower.
translation: 我猜我们可以适当降低塔的高度。

original: I only follow the word of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 我只听从[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap]'s onto me. [From.GetSheHeCap] must disappear.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]干扰了我。[From.GetSheHeCap]必须消失。

original: §Y[From.GetBestName]§! will be lured to the top of the tower...
translation: §Y[From.GetBestName]§!将被引到塔楼的顶部……

original: I managed to persuade [From.GetBestName] to follow me to the top of the scaffolding so that [From.GetSheHe] could properly inspect the tower. The view from the top is breathtakingly beautiful, a fact that [From.GetName] soon will experience in the literal sense.
translation: 我设法说服[From.GetBestName]跟着我到建筑塔楼的顶部，这样[From.GetSheHe]可以全面查看塔楼。塔顶的风景美不胜收，而[From.GetName]即将在字面意义上「体验」。

original: Careful there...
translation: 小心有……

original: [Root.GetName] pushes [From.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetName]推了[From.GetName]。

original: As you stretch your arms forward and put all of your body weight behind them to push [From.GetBestName] off the tower, [From.GetSheHe] suddenly bends down. [From.GetSheHeCap] must have found a coin or something. You stumble past [From.GetHerHim] and out into the open air.
translation: 当你为了将[From.GetBestName]推下塔而猛地伸出手并将身体的全部重量前倾的时候，[From.GetSheHe]突然弯下了腰。看来[From.GetSheHeCap]在地上看到了一枚金币或者什么东西。你一个酿跄越过了[From.GetHerHim]坠入空中。

original: Oh dear...
translation: 哦天哪……

original: As [From.GetBestName] is inspecting the view at the top of the tower, you reach out and and give [From.GetHerHim] a gentle push.
translation: 当[From.GetBestName]在塔顶观赏时，你伸出手臂给了[From.GetHerHim]轻轻一推。

original: Oh dear.
translation: 哦天哪。

original: The great tower that you began planning so long ago has finally been finished. A tower this tall can be seen from a long way away and people are equally amazed and frightened by the power you have displayed by accomplishing such a grand feat of construction. During the years of work you have spent your time perfecting your knowledge in the many key aspects of the science of construction - knowledge that will last centuries. The tower is also sure to hold back many thousands of enemy soldiers.
translation: 这座伟大的塔，在经过长时间的建造后终于完成了。此塔的高度从很远都能被看到，通过完成这项建造伟业，你展现了你的强大权力，震撼了人民。在施工的这些年，在你完善了自己在许多建筑学关键领域的知识——这些知识再过几百年也不会褪色。这座塔楼抵挡数千敌军都不在话下。

original: I am truly a professional builder now.
translation: 我现在可以算是一个专业的建筑师了。

original: This is merely a spare time pursuit.
translation: 这仅仅是我的一个业余爱好。

original: Your pride, the tower of [Root.GetName] has begun to lean. People everywhere are sniggering behind your back and making rude jokes about it. The only thing greater than your embarassment is your fear of it actually falling over.
translation: 你的骄傲，[Root.GetName]塔已经开始倾斜。所有的人都在我背后四处谈论，编造关于塔的粗鲁笑话。比起这些尴尬，你更担心它真的垮塌。

original: Before you owned the lands of the county [Root.GetName] a tall tower was built here by [tower_founder.GetBestName]. Now after years of standing proud vigil the tower has begun to lean and people are worried that it might fall over.
translation: 在你占据[Root.GetName]之前，[tower_founder.GetBestName]在这盖了一座高塔。历经多年屹立俯视，现在塔已经开始倾斜，人们担心它随时会倒塌。

original: This is all the mason's fault!
translation: 这都是石匠的错！

original: This is the result of lazy workers not following instructions!
translation: 都是懒惰的工人不服从命令的结果！

original: It's my own fault, unfortunately.
translation: 很不幸，这是我自己的问题。

original: How unfortunate. It is a fine tower.
translation: 多么不幸。这是一座很好的塔。

original: The angle of inclination of your leaning tower is increasing daily now. Perhaps you should try to save it by propping up the construction?
translation: 这塔的倾斜角度越来越大，也许你该撑住它？

original: I must save the tower at whatever cost!
translation: 我必须不惜代价来保护这座塔！

original: I will put in reasonable effort to save the tower.
translation: 以合理的手段来拯救这座塔。

original: I will put my trust in destiny.
translation: 只须相信命运。

original: Your great tower is now strengthened and has stopped tipping, resting at a steady angle of inclination. You hope it will stay like that. It does, however, still lean at a considerable angle and it embarrasses you to admit that you built it.
translation: 高塔现在变得稳固了，停在了一个角度不再继续倾倒。你希望它保持这样。确实如此，然而这座塔已经倾斜了相当大的角度，它仍然是你的一个耻辱。

original: Your great tower is now strengthened and has stopped tipping, resting at a steady angle of inclination. You hope it will stay like that. It does, however, still lean at a considerable angle and it looks quite weird.
translation: 高塔现在变得稳固了，停在了一个角度不再继续倾倒。你希望它保持这样。确实如此，然而这座塔已经倾斜了相当大的角度，看上去很诡异。

original: At least it didn't fall on someone's head.
translation: 至少他没砸在别人头上。

original: You wake up in the middle of the night from a loud bang followed by a long rumbling sound as if from the biggest thunderclap you ever heard. You rush to the window in fear, expecting the worst. Your fear proves correct - the leaning tower has finally toppled over and fallen on top of couple of houses who stood no chance against the might of thousands of granite blocks bombarding the roof.
translation: 半夜，你在一声巨响之后惊醒，这声音仿佛你听过的最响的雷暴。你跑到窗边，担心最严峻的事态发生了。你猜对了——斜塔终于轰然倒塌，砸中数间房屋，它们在数万块花岗岩的轰击下无处可逃。

original: I hope no one got hurt.
translation: 我希望没有人受伤。

original: You have been informed that a foreign statesman from far away has arrived to your realm and you head out to greet his entourage in person. When you meet up with them you prepare to exchange noble pleasantries, but you don't even have time to introduce yourself before you are interrupted with a question: 'Where is [tower_founder.GetBestName], the magnificent mind behind this masterly work? I would pay well to meet this genius in person,' the statesman blurts out while pointing at the leaning tower.
translation: 你得知遥远国度的外国大臣已经到达你的领地，你亲自出来迎接他们一行。遇到他们后，你正准备寒暄一番，但还没有来得及自我介绍，就被问题打断。「[tower_founder.GetBestName]在哪里？哪里能见到设计这精湛作品的伟大头脑？我可以付很多钱，请让我亲自见见这位天才。」大臣指着斜塔脱口而出道。

original: You have been informed that a foreign statesman from far away has arrived to your realm and you head out to greet his entourage in person. When you meet up with them you prepare to exchange noble pleasantries but you don't even have time to introduce yourself before you are interrupted with a question: 'Where is [tower_founder.GetBestName], the magnificent mind behind this masterly work? Especially the slanted door and uneven stairs are fresh and new details. I would pay well to meet this genius in person,' the statesman blurts out while pointing at the leaning tower.
translation: 你得知遥远国度的外国大臣已经到达你的领地，你亲自出来迎接他们一行。遇到他们后，你正准备寒暄一番，但还没有来得及自我介绍，就被问题打断。「[tower_founder.GetBestName]在哪里？哪里能见到设计这精湛作品的伟大头脑？特别是这倾斜的门和不平的楼梯，都是新鲜的细节。我可以付很多钱，请让我亲自见见这位天才。」大臣指着斜塔脱口而出道。

original: You have been informed that a foreign statesman from far away has arrived to your realm and you head out to greet his entourage in person. When you meet up with them you prepare to exchange noble pleasantries but you don't even have time to introduce yourself before you are interrupted with a question. 'Where is [stonemason.GetBestName], the magnificent mind behind this masterly work? I would pay well to meet this genius in person,' the statesman blurts out while pointing at the leaning tower.
translation: 你得知遥远国度的外国大臣已经到达你的领地，你亲自出来迎接他们一行。遇到他们后，你正准备寒暄一番，但还没有来得及自我介绍，就被问题打断。「[stonemason.GetBestName]在哪里？哪里能见到设计这精湛作品的伟大头脑？特别是这倾斜的门和不平的楼梯，都是新鲜的细节。我可以付很多钱，请让我亲自见见这位天才。」大臣指着斜塔脱口而出道。

original: You have been informed that a foreign statesman from far away has arrived to your realm and you head out to greet his entourage in person. When you meet up with them you prepare to exchange noble pleasantries but you don't even have time to introduce yourself before you are interrupted with a question. 'Where is [stonemason.GetBestName], the magnificent mind behind this masterly work? Especially the slanted door and uneven stairs are fresh and new ideas. I would pay well to meet this genius in person,' the statesman blurts out while pointing at the leaning tower.
translation: 你得知遥远国度的外国大臣已经到达你的领地，你亲自出来迎接他们一行。遇到他们后，你正准备寒暄一番，但还没有来得及自我介绍，就被问题打断。「[stonemason.GetBestName]在哪里？哪里能见到设计这精湛作品的伟大头脑？特别是这倾斜的门和不平的楼梯，都是新鲜的细节。我可以付很多钱，请让我亲自见见这位天才。」大臣指着斜塔脱口而出道。

original: Uhm. Of course, I'll fetch him from my, humm... court.
translation: 嗯。当然，我会把他从我的，嗯……我的宫廷带来。

original: I'll fetch him right away.
translation: 我马上带他来。

original: He's not here. He's got more important matters to attend to.
translation: 他不在这里。他有更重要的事情。

original: You are talking to [Root.GetHerHim] right now.
translation: 你正在和那个[Root.GetHerHim]说话。

original: It was constructed here before my rule.
translation: 它是在我治理这个领地之前建好的。

original: Uhm. Of course, I'll fetch him from my, humm... court.
translation: 嗯。当然，我会把他从我的，嗯……我的宫廷带来。

original: You wake up and go to the window to greet the sun, and then suddenly realize that your castle garden has been neglected for years and turned into an overgrown and chaotic disgrace. The weeds are knee-high and vines are making it almost impassible without having a sword at hand. Something needs to be done about this.
translation: 你醒来后来到窗口，你突然意识到你的城堡花园一直被忽视多年，变成了充满杂草丛生的荒地。杂草及膝高，藤蔓丛生，不用剑几乎无法通行。你需要为此做出改变。

original: I'll make sure to make this a real garden with a glorious hedge maze!
translation: 我将会建造一个真正的花园！一个树篱迷宫！

original: But there's so little time.
translation: 但是我没时间。

original: It's hard work to clean out all the weeds from a huge garden. It will take many days and nights of hard labor to finish the preparatory work before you can even begin to grow the hedge maze.
translation: 这是一项艰苦的工作，你需要从一个巨大的花园里清理掉所有杂草。这需要许多天的艰苦劳动来完成准备工作，之后才可以开始建造的树篱迷宫。

original: I'll do it myself.
translation: 我自己来。

original: I'll need to acquire a helping hand.
translation: 我需要帮手。

original: The servants could use some more work.
translation: 仆人可以帮我做更多工作。

original: Now that the hedges are planted and you just need to wait for them to grow, you turn your attention to other details that your garden needs. Should you add some statues to the dead ends of your maze?
translation: 现在树篱已经种好，你要做的就是等它长大，你将注意力转移到花园的其他细节.或许你可以在迷宫的各个死胡同里放一些雕塑？

original: I'll add some magnificent statues of my family.
translation: 我会添加一些我家人的塑像。

original: I'll add some beautiful statues of religious figures.
translation: 我会添加一些漂亮的宗教塑像。

original: The shadows are enough decoration in the dead ends.
translation: 死胡同只有阴影不就行了。

original: Any garden with self-respect has a fountain, someone told you once. Now you have the possibility to build a fountain for your garden to flaunt your extravagance.
translation: 有人曾告诉你，任何美丽而高贵的花园都会有喷泉。现在你可以为你的花园建造一个喷泉来体现你的奢华。

original: I'll build a large fountain in the middle.
translation: 我将在花园的中间建立一个大型喷泉。

original: I'll have a fountain and wine shall flow through it all days of the week.
translation: 我会建造一个终日流淌着葡萄酒的喷泉。

original: It's not worth spending money on.
translation: 我不会在这上面花钱。

original: It's time to fill out the rows of plants around the garden. You could either import exotic flowers from far away or you could plant local species.
translation: 是时候在你的花园里添上花朵了，你既可以从远处进口异国情调的花卉品种也可以在你的花园里种植当地的植物。

original: Let's import flowers to bring that exotic flavor.
translation: 让我们进口一些异国花卉。

original: The local flora is as beautiful as any other flowers can be.
translation: 本地的植物足够美丽，其他地方的鲜花不会强到哪里去。

original: There's a spot that is unused in a secluded part of the garden. Some people would say it's a perfect spot for a cosy pavilion.
translation: 花园里还剩一处隐蔽的场所没有被利用，有些人认为这里刚好可以建一座凉亭。

original: That sounds romantic, let's do it.
translation: 听起来挺浪漫的，那就建吧。

original: That sounds a bit too romantic for my taste.
translation: 不，就我的品味而言浪漫过头了。

original: The hedge maze and garden are finally finished. The expensive and exclusive details you added have not gone unnoticed and your garden has gained fame for it's magnificence across many realms. While creating the garden you also learned much about how to make things grow and flourish around you - flowers as well as relationships.
translation: 树篱迷宫花园终于完成。你添加的昂贵而独特的细节难以忽视，你的花园因为其华丽而在许多国家受到赞誉。在修筑花园的过程中，你还学会了如何让你周围的事物生长繁茂——不仅是花朵，还有人际关系。

original: The hedge maze and garden are finally finished. A complex hedge maze such as this is sure to grab the attention of people across the realm. While creating the garden you also learned much about how to make things grow and flourish around you - flowers as well as relationships.
translation: 树篱迷宫花园终于完成。如此复杂的树篱迷宫显然会吸引全国人民的注意。在修筑花园的过程中，你还学会了如何让你周围的东西生长繁茂——不仅是花朵，还有人际关系。

original: I like to see things flourish.
translation: 我就喜欢看见繁茂的东西。

original: I live my life as other [Root.GetMenWomen] do, navigating its rocks and obstacles, doing my best to achieve success in my endeavours. Still, everything we do takes place in the light of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], and we must take care lest the influence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] comes into our lives.
translation: 我一直和其他[Root.GetMenWomen]一样过日子，跨过艰难险阻，尽我所能取得成功。尽管如此，我们所做的一切都蒙受[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]庇佑，我们必须小心，免得让[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]影响到我们的生活。

original: Indeed it is so.
translation: 事实上，的确如此。

original: I should ponder this more deeply.
translation: 我应该更深入地思考这件事。

original: These religious ponderings give me a headache.
translation: 这些宗教思考让我头痛。

original: There are those in your realm who worship other gods. For example, it is known to you that [From.GetTitledName] openly follows the [From.Religion.GetName] faith. You sometimes wonder what [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] would think of your association with these people.
translation: 在你国内还有一些人崇拜别的神。例如，你得知[From.GetTitledName]公开追随[From.Religion.GetName]信仰。你有时想知道[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]如何看待你与这些人的联系。

original: We are more alike than we are different.
translation: 我们的相同点要多于不同点。

original: Their heathen delusions do not interest me.
translation: 我对这些异教妄想不感兴趣。

original: For a long while now, you have not felt the presence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in your thoughts. You are starting to wonder whether there really is any truth in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] or if perhaps it is just an old book written by clever liars.
translation: 很长时间以来，你并没有感觉到[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的存在。你开始怀疑[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]中记录的是否是真理，还是说它只是一个聪明的骗子写的古书。

original: It must be so, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is dead!
translation: 肯定是这样的，[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]已经死了！

original: These blasphemous feelings will soon pass.
translation: 这些亵渎的想法很快就会烟消云散。

original: With your strong devotion to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, you have spent countless hours reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and thinking about the meaning and origin of the sacred words therein. There are some things that don't quite correspond to what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are saying in their sermons, however...
translation: 你忠实地追随着[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰，你已经花了无数小时来阅读和思考[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]中圣言的含义和由来。但有一些东西，不太符合[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们在布道时所说的话语。

original: I have no right to question them.
translation: 我没有权利去质疑他们。

original: Perhaps it should not all be taken so literally after all.
translation: 也许它不该按字面意思理解。

original: These [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are charlatans!
translation: 这些[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们全是骗子！

original: I have spent years studying the basic tenets and beliefs of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, and by now I consider myself quite an advanced [Root.Religion.GetName] scholar.
translation: 我已经花了几年时间研究和[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的基本教义和信条，现在我认为自己是一个相当厉害的[Root.Religion.GetName]学者。

original: I will dedicate my life's work to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 我将为[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]奉献我的一生。

original: Religion has its uses and is well worthy of study.
translation: 宗教自有它的益处，很值得研究。

original: It is interesting, but there are other things in life.
translation: 这很有趣，但我的生活中还有其他事情。

original: I'll dedicate all my free time to games now!
translation: 现在我会把全部空闲时间用在游戏上！

original: Apprentice Boardgamer
translation: 棋盘游戏学徒

original: This character has found an appetite for playing strategic tabletop games.
translation: 这个角色有了战略桌游的爱好。

original: An architect has been brought before your court with a proposal. With your blessing, he will oversee the construction of a new castle in [From.GetName]. The castle design he suggests is novel - it will require less effort and resources to build, and yet without sacrificing the potency of its defenses.
translation: 一个建筑师被带到你的眼前，他提出请你恩准让他监督[From.GetName]新城堡的建设。他提出的设计相当新颖——这将使得城堡可以用更少的精力和资源来建造，而且不会牺牲其防御能力。

original: Build the castle!
translation: 建造这座城堡吧！

original: No, we have no need of his services.
translation: 不，我们不需要他的服务。

original: Construction of a new castle begins.
translation: 新城堡的建设开始了。

original: You send the architect away.
translation: 你要求建筑师离开。

original: An architect has been brought before your court, proposing the construction of a new castle in [From.GetName] for less resources than such a massive project would normally require. Before you can give him an answer, [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName], your [Root.GetTreasurerName], whispers in your ear: 'This charlatan is known to me. He cannot be trusted.'
translation: 一个建筑师被带到你的眼前，他提出在[From.GetName]建造城堡，比起一般情况下这种大型工程所需的资源，他的方案花费更少。在你给他答复之前，[Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]，你的[Root.GetTreasurerName]在你的耳边低语：「这是个众所周知的骗子，不可信任。」

original: An architect has been brought before your court, proposing the construction of a new castle in [From.GetName] for less resources than such a massive project would normally require. Before you can give him an answer, [Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName], your [Root.GetTreasurerName], whispers in your ear: 'I know of this man - I believe we can trust him.'
translation: 一个建筑师被带到你的眼前，他提出在[From.GetName]建造城堡，比起一般情况下这种大型工程所需的资源，他的方案花费更少。在你给他答复之前，[Root.job_treasurer.GetFullName]，你的[Root.GetTreasurerName]在你的耳边低语：「我知道这个人，我们可以相信他。」

original: Your guards caught the architect hired to build your castle in [FromFrom.GetName] trying to abscond with the gold you gave him. The wretch spent much of it on spirits and women, but the rest have been returned to your coffers. It looks as though there will be no castle.
translation: 你的卫兵抓住了你聘请建造[FromFrom.GetName]城堡的建筑师，他试图带着你给他的黄金跑路。这个家伙把大笔的钱花在了喝酒和嫖娼上，剩下的钱已经归还到您的国库。看起来不会有城堡了。

original: To the dungeons with him!
translation: 把这混蛋扔进地牢！

original: The construction of your new castle in [FromFrom.GetName] has been hampered by delays and material shortages. It looks as though the architect's initial estimates of the building costs were somewhat... optimistic. More funds will be required if the castle is to be finished.
translation: 在[FromFrom.GetName]的新城堡的建设已经因为材料短缺而延误。建筑师初步估计的建筑成本是有点……乐观。如果要完成这座城堡，我们会需要更多的资金。

original: Confound it all! Give them the gold they need.
translation: 真讨厌这一切！给他足够的资金！

original: Abandon construction... let us save what we can.
translation: 放弃建设吧……让我们保留下我们可以保留的。

original: Construction on the castle ceases.
translation: 城堡的建设停止了。

original: The castle you commissioned in [FromFrom.GetName] has been finished, and its construction required even less resources than originally planned! The surplus building material has been sold, and the gold placed in your coffers.
translation: 您在[FromFrom.GetName]委托建设的城堡已经完成，它的建设比原计划使用了更少的资源！剩余的建筑材料已被出售，出售所得的资金存入了您的库房。

original: Excellent!
translation: 太棒了！

original: The castle you commissioned in [FromFrom.GetName] has been finished, more or less on schedule, and it appears to be of sturdy construction.
translation: 您在[FromFrom.GetName]委托建设的城堡已经完成，它或多或少的如期完成，并且看上去拥有坚固的结构。

original: Not bad.
translation: 也还好。

original: The castle you commissioned in [FromFromFrom.GetName] has finally been finished, and despite the setbacks it appears to be of sturdy construction.
translation: 您在[FromFromFrom.GetName]委托城堡终于被完成，尽管结构似乎不太坚固。

original: About time.
translation: 这是时间问题。

original: There are no longer any suitable locations for the new castle you had commissioned, and the work has been abandoned. Fortunately, most of the funds had not yet been spent.
translation: 不再会有新的城堡，你委托的寻找合适地点的工作已被放弃。幸运的是，大部分资金尚未使用。

original: Ah, that's right... they were building a castle there.
translation: 啊，这是正确的……他们以前正在那里建造一座城堡。

original: Another day at court, and another endless procession of matters that you are required to pass judgment on. As yet another peasant drones on about his sickly pigs and the neighbor he believes poisoned them, you feel a profound emptiness. This isn't the life you had imagined.
translation: 法庭上的又一天，你又要面对没完没了的需要你裁决的事务。现在又一个农民开始唠叨起他的病猪并认为是邻居下的毒，这让你感到非常空虚。这不是你想要的生活。

original: By [This.Religion.GetRandomGodName], will you shut up about your pigs?!
translation: 以[This.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的名义，猪的事儿你能闭嘴了吗？

original: No matter how many issues you deal with, there are always more demanding your attention. As the cacophony of quarreling nobles echoes throughout your court, you suddenly snap and push your way through the bewildered crowds to reach the exit.
translation: 不管你解决了多少问题都总会有更苛刻的事情来烦扰你。当贵族们的争吵声响彻整个宫廷时，你突然大喝一声，挤开不知所措的人群到达出口。

original: I can't take this anymore.
translation: 我不能这样继续下去了。

original: A peasant accused of murder is dragged before your court. His wife and children were found butchered in the small hut they called home, and he was standing nearby, covered in their blood. Despite this damning evidence, the man continues to profess his innocence. What should be done with him?
translation: 一个被控谋杀的农民被拖上你的法庭。他的妻子和孩子被发现惨死在他们称为家的小屋里，而他就站在附近，浑身是血。尽管有如此确凿的证据，这个男人依然声称自己无罪。现在怎么做？

original: This animal must be hanged.
translation: 这种禽兽应该被绞死。

original: Toss him into the dungeons and leave him there.
translation: 把它扔进地牢让他呆在里面。

original: The evidence is circumstantial. Let him go.
translation: 证据并不清楚，放了他吧。

original: Perhaps some torture will loosen his tongue.
translation: 也许一点折磨可以让他开口。

original: The peasant is hanged for his crimes.
translation: 这个农民因为他的罪行而被绞死。

original: The peasant is thrown into the dungeons.
translation: 这个农民被扔进地牢。

original: The peasant is set free.
translation: 这个农民获得了自由。

original: The peasant is brought to your torture chamber.
translation: 这个农民被送到了你的审讯室。

original: Your guards inform you that yet another peasant family has been found butchered not far from where the first grisly murders took place. This time the killer was caught in the act, and he was perforated by arrows when he tried to escape your guardsmen. It would seem the peasant you had hanged was innocent after all...
translation: 你的卫兵告诉你，在那第一次可怕的谋杀案发生的不远处，另一个农民家庭也发现被杀。这一次的凶手被当场抓获，当他试图逃跑的时候被箭射穿。这似乎证明已经被你吊死的农民是无辜的……

original: Perhaps my verdict was a bit... hasty.
translation: 也许我的判决是有点……仓促。

original: Your guards inform you that yet another peasant family has been found butchered not far from where the first grisly murders took place. This time the peasant you set free was caught in the act, and he was perforated by arrows when he tried to escape your guardsmen.
translation: 你的卫兵告诉你，在那第一次可怕的谋杀案发生的不远处，另一个农民家庭也发现被杀。这一次的凶手被当场抓获，当他试图逃跑的时候他被箭射穿。

original: It was probably a bad idea to set him loose.
translation: 放了他可能是一个坏主意。

original: The peasant admitted his guilt under torture. Unfortunately, he expired in the process, so you may never know what compelled such a beast to murder his own family. Oh well.
translation: 在酷刑下农民承认了他的罪行。不幸的是，他已经断气了，所以你可能永远不知道是什么迫使这样的禽兽杀害他自己的家庭。好吧。

original: Justice has been served. Probably.
translation: 正义已经得到声张，也许吧。

original: Despite the torture, the peasant stubbornly refused to admit his guilt. Unfortunately, he expired in the process, but surely it was only a matter of time before he would have told us the truth of his crime...?
translation: 尽管饱受折磨，但这个农民却顽固地拒绝承认自己的罪行。不幸的是，他在刑讯的过程中断气，但这肯定只是时间早晚的问题，他如果没死他早晚会告诉我们他的犯罪事实……？

original: Yes... yes, of course.
translation: 是啊……是啊，当然了。

original: Yet another peasant family was found butchered not far from where the first grisly murders took place, but this time the killer was caught in the act. He was killed by your guardsmen while trying to escape, and the body they hauled back does decidedly not belong to the dead peasant who expired in your torture chamber.
translation: 你的卫兵告诉你，在那第一次可怕的谋杀案发生的不远处，另一个农民家庭已发现被杀。这一次的凶手被当场抓获，当他试图逃跑的时候被箭射穿。那个被你审讯到断气的农民被证明是无辜的。

original: Well... fancy that.
translation: 好的……真棒。

original: Your guards inform you that yet another peasant family has been found butchered not far from where the first grisly murders took place. This time the killer was caught in the act, and he was perforated by arrows when he tried to escape your guardsmen. It would seem the peasant you had imprisoned was innocent after all.
translation: 你的卫兵告诉你，在那第一次可怕的谋杀案发生的不远处，另一个农民家庭也发现被杀。这一次的凶手被当场抓获，当他试图逃跑的时候他被箭射穿。现在看来你关起来的那个农民是无辜的。

original: Well, don't just stand there! Set him free!
translation: 别傻站着了，把他放出来！

original: Your guards inform you that yet another peasant family has been found butchered not far from where the first grisly murders took place. This time the killer was caught in the act, and he was perforated by arrows when he tried to escape your guardsmen. It would seem the peasant you had imprisoned was innocent after all. Unfortunately he perished in your dungeons months ago.
translation: 你的卫兵告诉你，在那第一次可怕的谋杀案发生的不远处，另一个农民家庭也发现被杀。这一次的凶手被当场抓获，当他试图逃跑的时候他被箭射穿。现在看来你关起来的那个农民是无辜的。不幸的是，数月前他已在你的地牢里瘐死。

original: Well, how was I to know?
translation: 唉，我怎么知道会这样呢？

original: Your understanding of all matters pertaining to rulership and administration has increased.
translation: 你对于统治与管理上的事务的理解得到了加强。

original: Recent events have increased your grasp of stewardship.
translation: 最近的事件增长了你的管理能力。

original: Ruling from your court has increased your sense of justice. Your judgments have a profound effect on the lives of your subjects, and you have decided to be more fair.
translation: 断案加强了你的正义感。你的判决对于你的子民有很大影响力，你决定变得更公正。

original: As more and more people seek audience at your court, you have come to realize that there is much to do when it comes to the administration of the realm. You must work harder!
translation: 随着越来越多的人到你的宫廷请求觐见，你认识到要管理起整个领地还有很多需要做。你必须更努力！

original: You are no longer content to rest on your laurels. The problems facing your realm are legion, and clearly no one can fix them but you.
translation: 你不再满足于在桂冠上休憩。你的领地面临的问题足足有一个军团。除了你之外，没人能搞定它们。

original: The feuding between [feuding_noble_1.GetBestName] and [feuding_noble_2.GetBestName] has reached your court, and can no longer be ignored. As your vassals, both have brought their grievances against each other to you in the hope of garnering your support.
translation: [feuding_noble_1.GetBestName]和[feuding_noble_2.GetBestName]之间的矛盾激化到上呈到了你的公堂之上，并且他俩都不是无关紧要的小人物。作为你的封臣，他俩都将针对对方的诉求致以你，希望能得到你的支持。

original: [feuding_noble_1.GetTitledFirstName] is clearly in the right.
translation: 明显[feuding_noble_1.GetTitledFirstName]是正确的。

original: [feuding_noble_2.GetTitledFirstName] has my support.
translation: 支持[feuding_noble_2.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: Both are acting like quarreling children!
translation: 两个都表现得像吵架的小儿！

original: A party of soldiers flying the banner of [farm_fire_noble.GetBestName] recently set up camp in the middle of a field belonging to a farmer in [Root.Capital.GetName]. According to the farmer, their camp fire spread out of control and his entire crop was reduced to ashes. He has brought the matter before your court and demands compensation.
translation: 一队举着[farm_fire_noble.GetBestName]旗帜的士兵最近在一片属于一个[Root.Capital.GetName]农民的土地上扎营。据该农民所说，他们的营火失控把他的所有作物都烧成了灰。他已将此事上呈给了你，并要求获得赔偿。

original: [farm_fire_noble.GetTitledFirstName] is to compensate the farmer.
translation: [farm_fire_noble.GetTitledFirstName]将赔偿这个农民。

original: The fire was a divine act. No one is responsible.
translation: 这是神圣之火。无人需要负责。

original: I shall pay the farmer out of my own coffers.
translation: 我来赔偿这个农民吧。

original: A woman accused of witchcraft in [witch_province.GetName] has been dragged before your court. Several witnesses have seen her performing dark rituals in her secluded hut, possibly related to recent crop failures. She claims innocence, and it falls on you to determine her fate.
translation: 一个在[witch_province.GetName]被指控为巫婆的女人被拉到了你的廷前。几个目击者表示见过她在密室中进行黑暗仪式，这很可能跟最近的歉收有关。她则自称是无辜的，现在需要你来决定她的命运。

original: She will burn at the stake.
translation: 她应该被绑在柱子上烧死。

original: Throw the fiend in the dungeons!
translation: 把这个恶魔扔进地牢！

original: What nonsense is this? Release the poor woman at once!
translation: 这是什么谬论？立刻放了这个可怜的女人！

original: Several tavern owners in [drunken_rampage.GetName] have come forward to your court with complaints against [noble_drunkard.GetBestName]. Apparently, [noble_drunkard.GetSheHe] has gone on drunken rampages in all of their establishments, and they are demanding compensation. [noble_drunkard.GetTitledFirstName] claims to have no memory of the nights in question.
translation: 几个在[drunken_rampage.GetName]的酒馆老板来到了你的廷前对[noble_drunkard.GetBestName]进行控诉。[noble_drunkard.GetSheHe]貌似在他们所有人的地方都发过酒疯，故而他们现在要求赔偿。但是[noble_drunkard.GetTitledFirstName]则声称对这些事情毫无印象。

original: [noble_drunkard.GetTitledFirstName] shall compensate the tavern owners.
translation: [noble_drunkard.GetTitledFirstName]应当赔偿这些酒馆老板。

original: Drinking and debauchery are what your taverns are for, are they not?
translation: 你们的酒馆不就是为了醉酒和放纵开的吗？

original: Sigh... I will pay.
translation: 唉……我来赔吧。

original: During a visit to [mayor_city.GetName], [brigands_noble.GetBestName] and [brigands_noble.GetHerHis] entourage were accosted by brigands who made off with several valuables. Efforts to catch the thieves have failed, and [brigands_noble.GetTitledFirstName] is now demanding compensation from [brigands_mayor.GetBestName]. The matter has been brought for arbitration at your court.
translation: 在[mayor_city.GetName]访问期间，[brigands_noble.GetBestName]和[brigands_noble.GetHerHis]随从们被山贼盯上了，让他们得手了好几件贵重物品。抓获小偷的尝试失败了，[brigands_noble.GetTitledFirstName]要求[brigands_mayor.GetBestName]进行赔偿。这事正等待着你的仲裁。

original: It seems fair. [brigands_mayor.GetTitledFirstName] will pay for what was lost.
translation: 看上去很公平。[brigands_mayor.GetTitledFirstName]将赔偿损失。

original: [brigands_mayor.GetTitledFirstName] can hardly be held responsible for this theft!
translation: [brigands_mayor.GetTitledFirstName]不该对这次失窃事件负责！

original: I will personally compensate [brigands_noble.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我亲自赔偿[brigands_noble.GetTitledFirstName]吧。

original: Whether it is deserved or not, your decisions at court have earned you a reputation of being incredibly wise. People journey from far away to seek your advice.
translation: 无论是实至名归还是如何，你在廷议上的决策给你带来了一个英明的名声。人们不远万里过来寻求你的建议。

original: Your vassals have come to respect your rulership, even if they do not always agree with your decisions. No one questions that you have what it takes to rule.
translation: 你的封臣们开始尊重你的统治，尽管他们并不总是同意你的决定。没人质疑你的统治权。

original: We will play for money!
translation: 我们将为了赌注而战！

original: We will play for honor!
translation: 我们将为了荣誉而战！

original: Very well, let's play!
translation: 很好，开始吧！

original: Hail to the [Root.GetTitle]!
translation: 向[Root.GetTitle]致敬！

original: I will get you next time.
translation: 下次我会击败你。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] has challenged you to a duel. The only honorable response would be to accept the challenge.
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]向你发起决斗。唯一不损荣誉的回应只能是接受这个挑战。

original: Challenge accepted.
translation: 接受挑战。

original: No, that sounds dangerous.
translation: 不，听上去太危险了。

original: [From.GetBestName] has chosen to accept your challenge to personal combat. The duel will take place in the next few days.
translation: [From.GetBestName]选择了接受你的决斗。决斗将在几天内举行。

original: Let's fight!
translation: 战吧！

original: The spineless, [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName], has refused your challenge.
translation: 那个没骨气的[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetTitledFirstName]逃避了你的挑战。

original: Pathetic.
translation: 可悲。

original: It is the day of your duel against [opponent.GetBestName]. A crowd has gathered to witness the event, and what a show they get. The fight starts off fiercely, as the clashing of metal is violent enough to quiet the murmurs of the spectators. For a while it seems like neither of you will gain the upper hand, until you manage to parry [opponent.GetBestName]'s blade and deliver a powerful blow to [opponent.GetHerHis] defensless arm. [opponent.GetSheHeCap] drops [opponent.GetHerHis] weapon on the ground and lets out a blood-curdling scream, staring in shock at the gruesome wound.
translation: 今天是你的决斗之日，对手是[opponent.GetBestName]。人群涌来观赏，多么精彩的对决。一开始打斗就非常激烈，金属的撞击声让观众很快安静下来。有段时间看上去没有人可以占到上风，直到你成功抵御住[opponent.GetBestName]的刀锋，并且对[opponent.GetHerHis]羸弱的护甲使出了有力的一击。[opponent.GetSheHeCap]丢下了[opponent.GetHerHis]武器，发出了悚然的尖叫，盯着恐怖的伤口，看上去惊呆了。

original: The day of your duel against [opponent.GetBestName] has arrived. As you approach the location of the fight, you realize that a small crowd has gathered to watch the event. [opponent.GetBestName] starts aggressively, but you manage to evade and block the attacks [opponent.GetSheHe] hurls at you. Over time you gain the advantage, while your opponent is getting more and more fatigued. Finally you feint a high attack and [opponent.GetBestName] falls for it, failing to block as you strike out towards [opponent.GetHerHis] unprotected legs. Once injured, [opponent.GetSheHe] surrenders.
translation: 你与[opponent.GetBestName]的决斗之日到来了。当你走向决斗场的时候，你发现一小群人已经聚拢起来观赏。[opponent.GetBestName]一开始就极具侵略性，但你成功的躲避阻挡了[opponent.GetSheHe]针对你的进攻。渐渐地你取得了优势，而你的对手却越来越疲乏。终于你从高位发动了一次佯攻，[opponent.GetBestName]被骗到了，在对方试图阻拦的同时，你对着[opponent.GetHerHis]不设防的腿部发动了攻击。受伤之后，[opponent.GetSheHe]认输。

original: It is the day of your duel against [challenger.GetBestName]. A crowd has gathered to witness the event, and what a show they get. The fight starts off fiercely, as the clashing of metal is violent enough to quiet the murmurs of the spectators. For a while it seems like neither of you will gain the upper hand, until you manage to parry [challenger.GetBestName]'s blade and deliver a powerful blow to [challenger.GetHerHis] defensless arm. [challenger.GetSheHeCap] drops [challenger.GetHerHis] weapon on the ground and lets out a blood-curdling scream, staring in shock at the gruesome wound.
translation: 今天是你的决斗之日，对手是[challenger.GetBestName]。人群涌来观赏，多么精彩的对决。一开始打斗就非常激烈，金属的撞击声让观众很快安静下来。有段时间看上去没有人可以占到上风，直到你成功抵御住[challenger.GetBestName]的刀锋，并且对[challenger.GetHerHis]羸弱的护甲使出了有力的一击。[challenger.GetSheHeCap]丢下了[challenger.GetHerHis]武器，发出了悚然的尖叫，盯着恐怖的伤口，看上去惊呆了。

original: The day of your duel against [challenger.GetBestName] has arrived. As you approach the location of the fight, you realize that a small crowd has gathered to watch the event. [challenger.GetBestName] starts aggressively, but you manage to evade and block the attacks [challenger.GetSheHe] hurls at you. Over time you gain the advantage, while your opponent is getting more and more fatigued. Finally you feint a high attack and [challenger.GetBestName] falls for it, failing to block as you strike out towards [challenger.GetHerHis] unprotected legs. Once injured, [challenger.GetSheHe] surrenders.
translation: 你与[challenger.GetBestName]的决斗之日到来了。当你走向决斗场的时候，你发现一小群人已经聚拢起来观赏。[challenger.GetBestName]一开始就极具侵略性，但你成功的躲避阻挡了[challenger.GetSheHe]针对你的进攻。渐渐地你取得了优势，而你的对手却越来越疲乏。终于你从高位发动了一次佯攻，[challenger.GetBestName]被骗到了，在对方试图阻拦的同时，你对着[challenger.GetHerHis]不设防的腿部发动了攻击。受伤之后，[challenger.GetSheHe]认输。

original: Walk away as victor.
translation: 以胜利者的姿态离去。

original: Walk away as victor.
translation: 以胜利者的姿态离去。

original: I will show no mercy!
translation: 绝不留情！

original: The day of your duel has come, and you step up to your opponent, [From.GetBestName], while raising your blade. The fight starts off fiercely as neither of you hold back, the echo of clashing metal following every brutal attack. For a long time it's unclear who will stand victorious, until a parry throws you off balance, leaving you an open target. [From.GetBestName] instantly strikes out, and an eruption of pain ravages your body as their blade digs deep into your arm. You let out a blood-curdling scream, and the duel is lost.
translation: 决斗之日到来了。你向着你的对手[From.GetBestName]的方向踏出一步，并且举起了剑。战斗开始时十分激烈，你和对手都没后退，无情的攻击伴随着金属撞击的声响。谁也不知道你们中的哪一个能获胜。终于，一次闪避使你失去平衡，把你变成了活靶子。[From.GetBestName]全力一击，你感到一阵剧痛，对方的武器也刺穿了你的护具。你发出惊悚的嚎叫，输掉了决斗。

original: The duel starts violently, as your tactic is to strike at [From.GetBestName]'s garde repeatedly until it folds. However, you seem to be unable to overwhelm [From.GetHerHis], as [From.GetSheHe] blocks and evades your every attack with ease. As time passes you grow more and more fatigued, and predicting [From.GetBestName]'s maneuvers gets all the more challenging. You curse your slow reactions as you try to parry a high attack, which [From.GetSheHe] used to feint into a low blow, striking at your legs. The resulting wound isn't fatal, but it hinders your movement and you reluctantly yield to your opponent.
translation: 决斗十分激烈，你的战术是不断的击打[From.GetBestName]的武器使其卷刃。然而，看上去你没法压制住[From.GetHerHis]，[From.GetSheHe]很轻松的格挡或者闪开了你的每一次进攻。随着决斗进行你感到越来越疲惫，并且发现要预测[From.GetBestName]的下一步动作变得愈发困难。当你试图回避一个高位攻击的时候你内心咒骂身体的迟钝，然而[From.GetSheHe]利用假动作对你的下盘发动了攻击，你的双腿被砍中。伤口并不致命，但是这道伤口妨碍了你的移动，你很勉强才能挡住对方的进攻。

original: Curses!
translation: 天杀的！

original: You charge at [opponent.GetBestName] as soon as the duel begins. [opponent.GetSheHeCap] is equally aggressive, and delivers vicious blows that you barely manage to evade. You hear the people that have gathered to watch your brawl gasp at the fury that is displayed. Their horror isn't surprising, since both of you manage to land more than a handful blows on each-other, causing injuries that would bring a less passionate man to his knees. The duel rages on as both of you refuse to yield, and soon enough you manage to slash [opponent.GetFirstName] in the side, causing a fatal wound. For a moment you seem victorious, but as your rage subsides, you're overwhelmed by pain. Looking down, you find [opponent.GetFirstName]'s blade driven straight through your stomach.
translation: 决斗一开始，你就冲向[opponent.GetBestName]。[opponent.GetSheHeCap]同样很凶猛，他凶狠的击打你只能勉强躲开。你听到聚来看你们打斗的人被场上的怒气所震慑。这并不奇怪，你们两人都对对方发动了不计其数的攻击，要是不够勇敢，早就被伤痛击倒了。决斗继续进行，两人都不愿认输，很快你成功地砍到了[opponent.GetFirstName]的侧身，造成致命的伤害。霎时你看到了胜利的曙光，但当你的气势稍有减退，就被疼痛感击倒了。你一低头，发现[opponent.GetFirstName]的刀刃直插你的腹部。

original: You charge at [challenger.GetBestName] as soon as the duel begins. [challenger.GetSheHeCap] is equally aggressive, and delivers vicious blows that you barely manage to evade. You hear the people that have gathered to watch your brawl gasp at the fury that is displayed. Their horror isn't surprising, since both of you manage to land more than a handful blows on each-other, causing injuries that would bring a less passionate man to his knees. The duel rages on as both of you refuse to yield, and soon enough you manage to slash [challenger.GetFirstName] in the side, causing a fatal wound. For a moment you seem victorious, but as your rage subsides, you're overwhelmed by pain. Looking down, you find [challenger.GetFirstName]'s blade driven straight through your stomach.
translation: 决斗一开始，你就冲向[challenger.GetBestName]。[challenger.GetSheHeCap]同样很凶猛，他凶狠的击打你只能勉强躲开。你听到聚来看你们打斗的人被场上的怒气所震慑。这并不奇怪，你们两人都对对方发动了不计其数的攻击，要是不够勇敢，早就被伤痛击倒了。决斗继续进行，两人都不愿认输，很快你成功地砍到了[challenger.GetFirstName]的侧身，造成致命的伤害。霎时你看到了胜利的曙光，但当你的气势稍有减退，就被疼痛感击倒了。你一低头，发现[challenger.GetFirstName]的刀刃直插你的腹部。

original: A crowd has come to witness your duel, and you enter the circle they have formed, finally facing [opponent.GetBestName]. You already know that you will stand victorious, as such a weak creature cannot possibly pose a challenge to someone like you. It's clear that [opponent.GetBestName] isn't confident in [opponent.GetHerHis] chances, as [opponent.GetSheHe] charges you and desperately swings at your garde. Easily evading the mindless slashes, you quickly end the fight by surprising your opponent with an elegant dodge, coming up behind [opponent.GetHerHim] and dealing a deadly blow to [opponent.GetHerHis] neck, decapitating [opponent.GetHerHim].
translation: 人群涌来观赏你的决斗，你走进了他们形成的圆圈，面对着[opponent.GetBestName]。对于获取最终的胜利胸有成竹，因为对面的那个可怜的家伙不对你构成任何威胁。很显然[opponent.GetBestName]并不对[opponent.GetHerHis]获胜抱有希望，[opponent.GetSheHe]向你猛冲而来，绝望地击打你的护盾。你轻松地躲开了这种盲目的攻击，趁对手还在因为你优雅的闪避而目瞪口呆，绕到[opponent.GetHerHim]身后，对着[opponent.GetHerHis]脖颈发动致命一击，斩下了[opponent.GetHerHim]的头颅，迅速地结束了这场战斗。

original: A crowd has come to witness your duel, and you enter the circle they have formed, finally facing [challenger.GetBestName]. You already know that you will stand victorious, as such a weak creature cannot possibly pose a challenge to someone like you. It's clear that [challenger.GetBestName] isn't confident in [challenger.GetHerHis] chances, as [challenger.GetSheHe] charges you and desperately swings at your garde. Easily evading the mindless slashes, you quickly end the fight by surprising your opponent with an elegant dodge, coming up behind [challenger.GetHerHim] and dealing a deadly blow to [challenger.GetHerHis] neck, decapitating [challenger.GetHerHim].
translation: 人群涌来观赏你的决斗，你走进了他们形成的圆圈，面对着[challenger.GetBestName]。对于获取最终的胜利胸有成竹，因为对面的那个可怜的家伙不对你构成任何威胁。很显然[challenger.GetBestName]并不对[challenger.GetHerHis]获胜抱有希望，[challenger.GetSheHe]向你猛冲而来，绝望地击打你的护盾。你轻松地躲开了这种盲目的攻击，趁对手还在因为你优雅的闪避而目瞪口呆，绕到[challenger.GetHerHim]身后，对着[challenger.GetHerHis]脖颈发动致命一击，斩下了[challenger.GetHerHim]的头颅，迅速地结束了这场战斗。

original: Schwop.
translation: 唰。

original: You're well aware of your own ability, or lack of thereof, and therefore know that your duel with [From.GetBestName] will be onesided. Hoping to get the upper hand through surprise, you charge them the second they appear on the battleground. However, your sudden move doesn't faze them, and your desperate stabs are being easily parried. As [From.GetBestName] dodges one of your high blows, they get plenty of time to come up behind you and slash at your neck. There's no time to feel pain, as you fade from this world much too quickly to register your head being separated from the rest of your body.
translation: 你很清楚自己的实力，与[From.GetBestName]的战斗完全是一边倒的。你希望出奇制胜，趁着他一上战场就冲向他。不过对手没有因为奇袭而狼狈不堪，毫不费力地挡下了你的刺击。在躲开你的高位打击之后，[From.GetBestName]可以气定神闲地转到你身后，砍向你的脖子。你没有感觉到疼痛，因为咽气太快，你没来得及看到自己身首分离的景象。

original: Schwop.
translation: 唰。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] has stained your honor by forcing you down into the dirt in a duel. It is only natural that you start to plan your revenge.
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]通过在决斗中将你打趴在地成功地玷污了你的荣誉。很自然地，你开始谋划你的复仇。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName] will feel the wrath of my vengeance!
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]将品尝到我复仇的怒火！

original: I'd better not make more enemies than I already have.
translation: 我最好不要额外树敌。

original: [From.GetBestName] did not take lightly on being defeated in a duel. [From.GetSheHeCap] has sworn to avenge [From.GetHerHis] defeat.
translation: [From.GetBestName]对决斗失败的事情耿耿于怀。[From.GetSheHeCap]发誓要为[From.GetHerHis]失败复仇。

original: Seems like I've made myself an enemy today.
translation: 看上去今天我又结了个仇家。

original: Another enemy to my collection.
translation: 又一个敌人。

original: You realize that to become a great fighter you would need to get in better shape. There's a great path in the nearby woods that would be excellent for running.
translation: 你意识到要成为一个卓越的战士你需要有更好的体形。附近树林里有条不错的小路应该可以成为一条很棒的健身小径。

original: Let's go running.
translation: 让我们奔跑吧。

original: Throughout the day you've caught yourself grinding your teeth and being unable to focus on anything for long. Suddenly you realize why you have been in a bad mood all day - you just can't seem to abide having lazy people in your presence any more.
translation: 你咬牙切齿地跺脚了一整天，无法集中注意力。突然你意识到为什么你整天脾气这么坏——你只是不想让懒人围绕在你周围。

original: It grinds my gears, but I might cause distress if I lecture people like that.
translation: 这使我如鲠在喉，但如果我管教他们的话又会让他们痛苦。

original: A small spear-throwing competition could be entertaining, and it's also a great way to enliven your battle technique. Maybe you should arrange a contest at your court?
translation: 一个小型的投矛比赛会很有趣，正好也可以用来帮助你训练战斗技巧。或许你应当在你的宫廷里组织这么一场比赛？

original: My throwing arm will amaze everyone!
translation: 我的投掷技艺将会震惊全场！

original: Maybe another time.
translation: 改天吧。

original: Everyone attending the spear-throwing competition seems to be having a great time. They are partaking in the contest, conversing and laughing together. Perhaps the merryment is a bit too much, as a spear is carelessly hurled into the field as someone is still out there, measuring the distance of the previous throw.
translation: 所有在投矛比赛现场的人都玩得很不错，一起参赛，交谈和欢笑。或许玩得太开心了点，一支矛被不小心扔进了场，而丈量上一次投掷成绩的人还留在场内。

original: Well that's unfortunate.
translation: 哦那可真不幸。

original: After dozens of spears have been hurled through the air, a sole victor emerges. No one managed to throw farther than you!
translation: 在几打矛被投出去后产生了一个胜利者。没有人扔得比你还远！

original: This is a glorious day.
translation: 这是荣耀的一天。

original: After dozens of spears have been hurled through the air, a sole victor emerges. No one managed to throw farther than [From.GetBestName]!
translation: 在几打矛被投出去后产生了一个胜利者。没有人扔得比[From.GetBestName]还远！

original: Congratulations to [From.GetBestName]
translation: 祝贺[From.GetBestName]

original: Your daily routine involves repeatedly swinging your blade at a training dummy, however, you can only learn so much from fighting an inanimate enemy, and the practice gets dreadfully dull after a while.
translation: 你的日常锻炼计划中包含对训练人偶挥剑的练习，但是你从攻击不会动的敌人中只能学会丁点。一段时间之后你就觉得很无聊。

original: I could use someone to train with.
translation: 我要找真人来练练。

original: As you replace your training dummy with a real person, you find that facing an intelligent enemy is a lot harder, but also more rewarding. After many bruises and cuts, it's clear that you've gained experience and have better control of a fight than ever before.
translation: 在将训练对象换成真人后，你发现面对一个机敏的敌人要更困难，而收获也更多。无数次跌打滚爬使你积累了宝贵的经验，掌握了更多的战斗技巧。

original: Good fighting, [From.GetBestName]!
translation: 精彩的打斗，[From.GetBestName]！

original: Even with blunt blades a training fight is a dangerous thing. Sometimes a sword might strike just a bit too hard.
translation: 即便用钝器，练习战也是件危险的事情。有时候剑打起来有点太困难了点。

original: That's enough fighting for this week.
translation: 这周就练到这吧。

original: Having spent countless of hours swinging your sword, it is clear that your technique is getting better. You know the essence of every possible strike to utilize in a fight.
translation: 无数次地挥剑后你的技艺有所精进。你知道战斗中的的每一个招式的精髓。

original: The hard training is paying off.
translation: 宝剑锋从磨砺出。

original: After a long time of training both day and night, you have finally mastered the art of combat. Few could contend with your extensive knowledge of battle techniques.
translation: 日夜苦练，你终于精通了单人战斗的技艺。没多少人在战斗的技术上了解得比你更多。

original: I will be known as a duelist.
translation: 我将以决斗家成名。

original: I think I might spend time on something else.
translation: 我想我该把时间用在别的事情上了。

original: Your ability to take down any man in a brawl is widely renown. Many speak of your prowess, and how it would be unwise to pick a fight with you.
translation: 你在争斗中打遍天下无敌手的能力广为人知。人们赞叹你的武艺高强，感叹向你挑战是有多么无谋。

original: It feels good to be recognized.
translation: 能被认可感觉很不错。

original: Violence seems to be able to solve all your problems - life is easier when you can simply smash things into submission.
translation: 依靠暴力貌似能解决你的所有问题，当你只需要打倒某些东西的时候，生活看起来容易多了。

original: I seem to no longer have the patience to negotiate.
translation: 我似乎再没有了妥协的耐性。

original: As war grows to be a constant presence in your life, you have on several occasion faced, nay, almost courted, death.
translation: 当战争成为家常便饭，你有好几次直面，不，是渴望面对死亡。

original: I no longer feel fear.
translation: 我不再感到畏惧。

original: The strict exercise regime you committed to after your decision to become a legendary warrior has made you one of the toughest persons around.
translation: 在你决定成为传奇战士后经受的严格训练已让你成为周围最坚韧的人之一。

original: The strict exercise regime you committed to after your decision to become a legendary warrior has impressed people enough to no longer consider you a weakling.
translation: 在你决定成为传奇战士后经受的严格训练已让给人足够的印象，不再认为你软弱可欺。

original: I feel like I could lift a small house.
translation: 我觉得我能举起一座小房子。

original: I feel like I could lift a small horse.
translation: 我觉得我能举起一匹小马。

original: [This.GetBestName] is increasing [This.GetHerHis] efforts to become a warrior.
translation: [This.GetBestName]正在尽[This.GetHerHis]努力成为一名战士。

original: Held Contest
translation: 举行比赛

original: Fled a Just Duel
translation: 逃离决斗

original: Warrior
translation: 战士

original: This character is known for being proficient at personal combat.
translation: 此人被认为精于个人战斗。

original: Great Warrior
translation: 伟大的战士

original: This character is known for being proficient at personal combat.
translation: 此人被认为精于个人战斗。

original: Despised Aristocrat
translation: 被鄙视的贵族

original: This character has been denying the ordinary population their rights.
translation: 此人曾拒绝平民的请愿。

original: Duel Victory
translation: 决斗胜利

original: This character has recently defeated another person in a duel.
translation: 此人近期在决斗中击败了对手。

original: Duel
translation: 决斗

original: Challenge §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a duel to uphold your honor. Duels can be considered dangerous to your health.
translation: 对§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!发起决斗来维护你的荣誉。决斗对于你的健康有威胁。

original: We will begin with the necessary preparations for the construction.
translation: 我们将开始对建设做一些必要准备。

original: the Headless
translation: 无头者

original: Construction Accident
translation: 建造事故

original: An accident that could've been avoided angers the population of [This.GetName].
translation: 一场可以避免的事故激怒了[This.GetName]的民众。

original: Outlawed Guild
translation: 非法行会

original: The cities in this county had one of the major guilds outlawed.
translation: 这个省份的城市有一个主要行会非法。

original: Carpenters Guild
translation: 木匠行会

original: There's a prominent Carpenters Guild in this county making construction fast and cheap.
translation: 这个省份有一个杰出的木匠行会，能让建筑的建造又快又便宜。

original: the Ruthless
translation: 无情者

original: the Beheader
translation: 砍头者

original: Your §YDynasty§! will appreciate this gesture.\n
translation: 你的§Y家族§!将会喜欢这个雕像。\n

original: Ruthless
translation: 无情

original: People will be upset about this merciless action.\n
translation: 人们会对这无情的行为不满。\n

original: As your efforts of gaining wealth grow all the more determined, you sleep less and less, since sleeping is not a profitable behavior.
translation: 你努力赚钱，减少了睡眠时间，因为睡觉不是一个有收益的行为。

original: I must have more gold!
translation: 我要有更多的金币！

original: Aspiring Gardener
translation: 有志成为园丁

original: This character has taken an interest in gardening.
translation: 此人对园艺很有兴趣。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaches you and presents to you a request to buy a small plot of your land in [Root.Capital.GetName]. This is a hard decision to take, since he promises to pay well for the land.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拜访了你，向你请求购买在[Root.Capital.GetName]的一小块土地。这个抉择对你来说很艰难，因为他答应会支付一大笔钱。

original: I do need the gold...
translation: 我确实需要钱……

original: There's not enough gold in your pockets to buy my land.
translation: 你袋里没有足够的金币来买我的地。

original: You have been presented with an opportunity to let everyone be reminded of your rulership. If you wish to mint new coins for your realm, there is a master of the craft that you can hire. Not only will the mintage be exquisite, it will be adorned with a glorious portrait of you.
translation: 有一个让所有人都记住你的统治的机会摆在你的面前。有一个熟练的铸币家你可以雇佣来铸造新的钱币，铸币会十分精美，上面还会印你高贵的头像。

original: Mint the coins for glory.
translation: 为了荣耀，铸造新币吧。

original: Debase the mints with less precious metals for profits.
translation: 在新币铸造中减少贵金属的份量以获得额外收益。

original: No, there's no need for additional currencies.
translation: 不，现在不需要更多的货币。

original: A merchant has managed to find out that the coins you had minted are counterfeit. You are being called a cheapskate, since they do not contain the precious metals that they were supposed to consist of.
translation: 一个商人终于发现你新铸的钱币是劣币。人们叫你守财奴，因为钱币里面并没有与面值相当的贵金属。

original: People might taunt my face on those coins now.
translation: 人们现在要对着钱币上的我的脸唾骂了。

original: A group of craftsmen has come to your court and shown off their work. They present you with fine goods, of which you are sure there would be a demand for in the realm. Noticing your interest, the craftsmen ask for some capital to start up a workshop, saying they lack the funds to do it on their own.
translation: 一队手工艺人来到了你的宫廷展示了他们的作品。东西都很不错，无疑会在域内畅销。他们注意到你的兴趣，请求你投资让他们开一座工坊，因为他们自己缺少资金。

original: This is a sound investment.
translation: 这是个合理投资。

original: A workshop will set up in [From.GetName], and begin preparation for producing goods.
translation: 一座工坊将在[From.GetName]建起来，开始准备生产商品。

original: No. Your lack of funds is not my problem.
translation: 不，你们缺钱关我屁事。

original: The craftsmen that you funded a couple of years ago have returned to tell you of their success. With your support they were able to set up their business, and it's now one of the most profitable enterprises in [FromFrom.GetName].
translation: 你数年前资助的工匠们回来告诉你，他们的事业获得了成功。在的你帮助下，现在他们的生意已经是 [FromFrom.GetName]最赚钱的事业之一。

original: Great! More taxes for me.
translation: 好极了！这能给我贡献更多利税。

original: There's a faint knock on your door, followed by a small figure peeking into the room. You remember him well, it's one of the craftsmen that you funded a couple of years ago. He shamefully tells you that the enterprise didn't go exactly as planned, and that their workshop is now bankrupt, with nothing to show for it.
translation: 随着怯生生的一声敲门，门缝中出现了一个细小的身影.你记起了他是你数年前资助开工坊的手工艺人中的一个。他羞愧地告诉你说他们的事业没能照计划进行，他们现在已经破产，一无所有。

original: That was a bad investment...
translation: 失败的投资……

original: There's a group of carpenters in [From.GetName] that are working together more and more, as well as taking on apprentices. This is a situation that cannot be ignored, and so you need to either approve of this carpenters' guild to ensure you have a good reputation amongst the skilled workers, or you could outlaw them to make sure that they're not an impediment on the local market structure.
translation: [From.GetName]有一群木匠越来越抱团，无论工作还是带学徒。这是个不能忽略的现象，你现在需要决定是同意建立木匠公会以维护你在这些熟练木匠中的良好声誉，还是宣布他们非法以保证不会对当地市场结构造成冲击。

original: I'll support the carpenters.
translation: 我会支持这些木匠。

original: Outlaw the guilds.
translation: 宣布公会非法。

original: Artisan Workshop
translation: 艺术工坊

original: A workshop in this county provide goods of high-quality.
translation: 这个省份有一个工坊，出产高品质的货物。

original: Sold Off Land to Burgher
translation: 土地被卖给了市民

original: The ruler has sold of valuable land for short term profits.
translation: 统治者售出了土地以换取短期利润。

original: Ever since your pursuit of wealth began and you started keeping a close eye on both income and expenses, your coffers seems to be filled to the brim more often than not.
translation: 自从你为了更多的财富开始计算收支，你的钱包相比以前似乎充实了很多。

original: A thriving economy is good for the realm.
translation: 繁荣的经济对国家有益。
